name: Leading Edge Aviation, Inc.
about: Leading Edge Aviation, Inc., based in Bend, Oregon, is a premier flight training institution specializing in both airplane and helicopter pilot training. With nearly 20 years of experience, we offer FAA Part 141 approved programs that efficiently and cost-effectively prepare students for professional pilot careers. Our courses include Private Pilot Certification, Instrument Rating, Commercial Certification, and various specialized training such as Mountain Flying, Turbine Transition, and Night Vision Goggle training. We partner with Central Oregon Community College to offer an Aviation Science Degree program, and our faculty includes former military aviators. Our commitment to safety, individualized instruction, and high-quality aircraft ensures students receive the best possible training to achieve their aviation goals. We are dedicated to helping students secure the financial means to complete their training and provide comprehensive support for all levels of flight instruction.
